Trade/Device Name(s): Dimension® CSAE Cyclosporine Extended Range Assay
Dimension® Cyclosporine CSAE Flex® reagent cartridge
Instrument(s)/Platform(s): Dimension® clinical chemistry system with Heterogeneous Module
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Dimension® CSAE Cyclosporine Extended Range Assay Flex® reagent cartridge for quantitative measurement of cyclosporine A in whole blood using enzyme immunoassay on Dimension® clinical chemistry system.
Indications for Use Summary: Intended to quantitatively measure cyclosporine A (CSA) in human whole blood to aid in management of heart, liver, and kidney transplant patients.
